segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman totally absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or see that mess happening right in front of her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, soaking her shoes, and she just keeps polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids over there are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that unstable stool, stretching to grab the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back; he's going to crash down and break everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, encouraging him like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; cabinets getting ruined, floor all wet and hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults let things get this out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies are probably for later, and now the kids are stealing them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a disaster this kitchen is turning into.
segments.speaker: PAR
